entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • R2R known test failure #87716
  • System.Speech is missing API documentation #87711
  • System.Numerics.Tensors is missing API documentation #87710
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests is missing API documentation #87709
  • Inconsistent ANSICodePage and OEMCodePage values #87705
    Future
  • Framework Not Detecting On Linux When Executing "dotnet" Command #87704
  • .Net NativeAOT doesn't generate System.Net.Security.Native lib #87701
  • all flags(ars) to optimize for native aot #87698
  • [Analyzer]: Extend string IndexOf => Contains analyzers to Span IndexOf/IndexOfAny/IndexOfAnyExcept #87691
  • [API Proposal]: Span.StartsWith/EndsWith(T) #87689
  • Failed to read environment variable [DOTNET_STARTUP_HOOKS], HRESULT: 0x800700CB #87687
  • Mac Catalyst/ARM64 crash: * Assertion: should not be reached at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:4109 #87682
  • [Tracking] Expose a `Lock` type #87673
    Future
  • Libraries tests timing out on AlmaLinux #87667
  • Things needing System.Net.Security.Native may not work on Bionic #87665
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_54719/test54719/test54719 #87663

Closed

  • Eliminate the need to preserve struct handles for `SIMD` types #69822
    Future
  • Debugger.IsAttached doesn't work #84736
  • Dataflow analysis taking forever #87596
  • ILLink produces invalid IL metadata with -b switch and Save assembly mode #86462
  • JIT-EE interface clean up (tracking issue) #86672
    Future
  • CurrencyNegativePattern can be 16 #87643
    Future
  • CQ: Big Value Type Suboptimal Inlining Code Generation #39732
    Future
  • Allow cancellation of Process standard IO stream operations on Windows #84290
    8.0.0
  • Can Unsafe.As do-not-enreg[SVB] ld-addr-op be elided on inlining? #10029
    Future
  • Struct getters are generating unneccessary instructions on x64 when struct contains floats #7200
    Future
  • Segfault in CMiniMdTemplate<CMiniMdRW>::getSignatureOfMemberRef #85777
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Investigate adding "phantom" replacements during physical promotion #87371
  • [API Proposal]: Bring back extensions API to ease adoption of extensions libraries from older frameworks #87480
    8.0.0
  • Possible regression in JavaScript [JSImport]/[JSExport] interop in a Blazor app (.NET 8 Preview 5) #87690
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid lowering for SELECT over mixed neg/not operands #87384
    8.0.0
  • Serializing type which hides inherited property with both properties ignored throws ArgumentException #66900
    8.0.0
  • is there any way to that vs 2022 exists using vswhere although i dont install it #86947
  • [hot reload] Support the GenericAddFieldToExistingType capability in Mono #86111
  • [Documentation] Request update on the documentation of IL2026 #85274
  • Random crashes in System.Net.Mail test suites with mono interpreter #87271
  • DependencyContextTests.DefaultWorksCorrectly test fails on native AOT #87694
  • Developers should not encounter property visibility issues when using STJ source generation #79161
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generation should accept init-only properties with JsonIgnoreCondition.Always #66003
    Future
  • HTTPS performance degradation in HttpClient after .NET 7 migration #78686
  • Client Certificate Authentication Time out after 100s On Linux #69167
    Future
  • 7.0 Native AOT linux-arm64 compiler references glibc 2.27 #84183
    7.0.x
  • Remove traceparent header from http requests #87635
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Unnecessary lookup in TrailingEpilogueInstructionsCount #75807
    8.0.0
  • Use MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute to clear Mono's reflection cache #50978
    8.0.0
  • [EnC] Implement the UpdateParameters capability #56626
    8.0.0
  • Make KeyValuePair<,> support in JSON src-gen mode trim-safe #60072
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Microbenchmarks failing with assertion `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/component/marshal-ilgen-stub.c:28, condition `!m_type_is_byref(t)' not met` #87623
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2203090 #87714
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Avoid doing copy propagation on ldaddr for gsharedvt vari… #87713
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a minor race condition in Monitor's AwareLock regarding tracking of waiter starvation #87703
    area-System.Threading, Future
  • CVE-2023-24936: Check type is allowed when deserializing instance types that implements INullable #87702
    area-System.Data
  • Refactor how diagnostics work in the interop generators #87700
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the costs for floating-point/simd to better reflect reality #87699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #87697
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixed System.Tests.DateTimeTests.TryFormat_MatchesToString test #87693
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assertion. #87692
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (3/n) #87688
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [mono][jit] Enabling some Vector4 methods as Intrinsics on arm64. #87684
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix typos in Process.cs #87683
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [PoC] surface Quic transport errors #87679
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Don't create type loader for apps that don't need it #87678
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • CurrencyNegativePattern can be 16 #87671
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Fix crossgen zip missing error #87662
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix TLS access on Bionic #87670
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Hardcode Debugger.IsAttached to false #87677
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not quote rpath passed to linker for Bionic #87669
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Limit number of tracked values in trim dataflow analysis #87634
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix missing assemblyref for typeref only kept for debug info in illink #87575
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix broken link in editing-and-debugging.md #87681
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Clean up JIT flags #87588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address feedback from #87680. #87695
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable async-over-sync FileStream read/writes to be cancelable on Windows #87103
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fully qualify return type on UnreachableException methods #87661
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Add support for induced field accesses in physical promotion #87410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix invalid lowering for SELECT over mixed neg/not operands #87674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} #87621
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • fix(66900): Adding test for confirm bug fix. #87167
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [hot reload][mono] Implement support for adding static and instance fields to generic classes #87285
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix `File.Copy` onto a symlink on macOS #87600
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix broken link in CONTRIBUTING.md #87685
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix concurrency issues with publishing transfomed imethod #87555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Attempt to fix browser-wasm test failures. #87680
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Unblock CI by removing AlmaLinux from libraries tests #87668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix DependencyModel tests on NativeAOT #87666
    area-DependencyModel
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (2/n) #87630
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • [mono][llvm] Fixed personality function on Windows #87675
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove KeyValuePairConverter. #87637
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix redundant MethodInfo lookup in UnixNativeCodeManager #87664
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2202323 #87660
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove dead code #87399
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Build integration support for Bionic in NativeAOT #87595
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to some hosting types #87599
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [wasm] Fix inclusion of `marshal-ilgen` component #87629
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Make virtual delegate targets less costly #87308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Inline TLS field access for linux x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check Locations length before accessing #87659
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Make sure intellisense files are copied to the ref pack output for the current TargetOS #87603
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add helix retries for debugger tests #87565
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: [mono] Do not ignore non-public custom attributes in dynamic assemblies #87406
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Ensure that the various Min and Max APIs are accelerated where possible #87641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Block "Convert To LibraryImport" in more unsupported cases #87503
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [jiterp] Low threshold jiterpreter CI run #86500
    NO-MERGE
  • [NativeAOT] Faster find unwind info on Unix #87204
    tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Invoke startup hook from ApplyStartupHook diagnostic command #87490
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add support for https proxy #87638
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Fix budgets for dynamic heap count and add smoothing to overhead computation #87618
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add new call fast path opcodes #87133
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Logging middleware #87550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Expose AVX512 Compare and BlendVariable APIs #87404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
